content.html:
There's an even bigger issue with live coding than "just" the potential impact on diversity. If you do stressful live coding, you're excluding a massive population. "A large population of people are impacted by performance anxiety (est. 40% of all adults in the U.S. [23])."
twitter.com/GergelyOrosz/s…
content.value:
There's an even bigger issue with live coding than "just" the potential impact on diversity.

If you do stressful live coding, you're excluding a massive population.

"A large population of people are impacted by performance anxiety (est. 40% of all adults in the U.S. [23])."

content.html:
I like how we do technical interviews at @gitlab. - Merge Request upfront to review as home exercise - Go through the review & implement suggestions Gives candidates enough time to prepare without a surprise. Focus on the technical discussion. Hopefully reduces stress.
twitter.com/gergelyorosz/s…
content.value:
I like how we do technical interviews at @gitlab.

- Merge Request upfront to review as home exercise
- Go through the review & implement suggestions

Gives candidates enough time to prepare without a surprise. Focus on the technical discussion. Hopefully reduces stress.
